document_data.name: Kelvin's Comfort
document_data.mainbody: '''Kelvin's Comfort''' was a tavern in [[Bryn Shander]].
document_data.Location: The tavern was located next to Bryn Shander's market square.
document_data.Services: The tavern was famous for its signature drink known as [[Flamebeard's Firebrandy]]. It also served [[mead]] from [[Good Mead]] and liquors imported from [[Mirabar]].
document_data.Inhabitants: Kelvin's Comfort was owned by [[shield dwarf]] [[Ogden Flamebeard]] sometime after the [[War of the Silver Marches]]. A frequent patron was [[Baric Nylef]] while he searched for Dwarven criminal [[Worvil Forkbeard]], who was known to be addicted to Flamebeard's Firebrandy.
